gurmukhi: <> siqgur pRswid ]
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?
translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

gurmukhi: 1 mMglw crx, s`c-kUV
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?
translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

gurmukhi: siqgur scw pwiqswhu gurmuiK scw pMQu suhylw
transliteration: Satigur Sachaa Paatisaahu Guramoukhi Sachaa Pandu Suhaylaa.
translation: The true Guru is the true emperor and the way of gurmukhs is the way of happiness.

gurmukhi: mnmuK krm kmwNvdy durmiq dUjw Bwau duhylw
transliteration: Manamoukh Karam Kamaanvaday Duramati Doojaa Bhaau Duhaylaa.
translation: Mind-orientd, manmukhs, act controlled by ill intellect and tread on painful path of duality.

gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu swDsMg Bwie Bgiq kir gurmuiK mylw
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Saadhasang Bhaai Bhagati Kari Guramoukhi Maylaa.
translation: Gurmukhs attain the fruit of delight in the holy congregation and with loving devotion meet the gurmukhs.

gurmukhi: kUVu kusqu AswD sMgu mnmuK duKPlu hY ivhuvylw
transliteration: Koorhu Kousatu Asaadh Sangu Manamoukh Doukh Phalu Hai Vihu Vaylaa.
translation: In the company of falsehood and the wicked, the fruit of sufferings of the mannzukhs grows like a poisonous creeper.

gurmukhi: gurmuiK Awpu gvwvxw pYrI pwauxw nyhu nvylw
transliteration: Guramoukhi Aapu Gavaavanaa Pairee Paaounaa Nayhu Navaylaa.
translation: Losing the ego and falling on the feet is a new path of love followed by gurmukhs.

gurmukhi: mnmuK Awpu gvwvxw gurmiq gur qy aukVu cylw
transliteration: Manamoukh Aapu Ganaavanaa Guramati Gur Tay Oukarhu Chaylaa.
translation: The manmukh makes himself noticed and moves away from the Guru and the wisdom of the Guru.

gurmukhi: kUVu scu sIh bkr Kylw ]1]
transliteration: Koorhu Sachu Seeh Bakar Khaylaa ?1?
translation: The game of truth and falsehood is similar to (impossible) meeting of the lion and the goat.

gurmukhi: 2 gurmuK mnmuK, s`c kUV
translation: Gurmukh, manmukh, truth and falsehood ,

gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu scu hY mnmuK duK Plu kUVu kUVwvw
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Sachu Hai Manamoukh Doukh Phalu Koorhu Koorhaavaa.
translation: The gurmukh attains the pleasure fruit of truth and the manmukh receives the bitter fruit of falsehood.

gurmukhi: gurmuiK scu sMqoKu ruKu durmiq dUjw Bwau pCwvw
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sachu Santokhu Roukhu Duramati Doojaa Bhaau Pachhaavaa.
translation: Gurmukh is tree of truth and contentment and the wicked person is the unstable shade of duality.

gurmukhi: gurmuiK scu Afol hY mnmuiK Pyir iPrMdI CwvwN
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sachu Adolu Hai Manamoukh Dhayri Dhirandee Chhaavaan.
translation: Gurmukh is firm like truth and manmukh, the mind oriented is like ever shifting shade.

gurmukhi: gurmuiK koiel AMb vx mnmuK vix vix hMFin kwNvwN
transliteration: Guramoukhi Koil Anb Van Manamoukh Vani Vani Handdhani Kaavaan.
translation: Gurmukh is like nightingale which resides in mango groves but manmukh is like a crow which wanders in forests from place to place.

gurmukhi: swDsMgiq scu bwg hY sbd suriq gurmMqu scwvwN
transliteration: Saadhasangati Sachu Baag Hai Sabad Surati Gur Mantu Sachaavaan.
translation: The holy congregation is the true garden where gurmantr inspires the consciousness to merge in the Word, the true shade.

gurmukhi: ivhu vx vil AswD sMig bhuqu isAwxp ingoswvwN
transliteration: Vihu Vanu Vali Asaadh Sangi Bahoutu Siaanap Nigosaavaan.
translation: Company of the wicked is like a wild poisonous creeper and the manmukh in order to develop it goes on playing many tricks.

gurmukhi: ijau kir vysuAw vMsu innwvwN ]2]
transliteration: Jiu Kari Vaysuaa Vansu Ninaavaan ?2?
translation: He is like the son of a prostitute who goes without a family name.

gurmukhi: 3 gurmuK mnmuK, s`c kUV
translation: Gurmukh, manmukh, truth and falsehood ,

gurmukhi: gurmuiK hoie vIAwhIAY duhI vlI imil mMglcwrw
transliteration: Guramoukhi Hoi Veeaaheeai Duhee Valee Mili Mangal Chaaraa.
translation: Gurmukhs are such as the marriage of two families where sweet songs are sung on both sides and pleasures is attained.

gurmukhi: duhu imil jMmY jwxIAY ipqw jwiq prvwr sDwrw
transliteration: Duhu Mili Janmai Jaaneeai Pitaa Jaati Paravaar Sadhaaraa.
translation: They are such as the son born of the union of mother and father gives happiness to the parents because the lineage and family of the father gets increased.

gurmukhi: jMmidAwN rxJuMJxw vMis vDweI ruxJuxkwrw
transliteration: Janmadiaan Rounajhounjhanaa Vansi Vadhaaee Roun Jhounakaaraa.
translation: Clarionets are played upon the birth of a child and celebrations are arranged on the further development of the family.

gurmukhi: nwnk dwdk soihly ivrqIsr bhu dwn dqwrw
transliteration: Naanak Daadak Sohilay Virateesar Bahu Daan Dataaraa.
translation: In the homes of mother and father songs of joy are sung and the servants are given many a gift.

gurmukhi: bhu imqI hoie vysuAw nw ipau nwauN innwau pukwrw
transliteration: Bahu Mitee Hoi Vaysuaa Naa Piu Naaoun Ninaaoun Poukaaraa.
translation: Son of a prostitute, friendly to everyone, has no name of his father and he is known as nameless.

gurmukhi: gurmuiK vMsI prm hMs mnmuiK Tg bg vMs hiqAwrw
transliteration: Guramoukhi Vansee Param Hans Manamoukhi Tdag Bag Vans Hatiaaraa.
translation: The family of gurmukhs is like paramhatis (the swans of high order which can sift milk from water i.e. truth from falsehood) and the family of the mind-oriented ones is like hypocrite cranes who kill others.

gurmukhi: sic sicAwr kUVhu kUiVAwrw ]3]
transliteration: Sachi Sachiaar Koorhahu Koorhiaaraa ?3?
translation: From truth the truthful and from falsehood the Hers are begotten.

gurmukhi: 4 gurmuK-mnmuK s`c-kUV
translation: Gurmukh, manmukh, truth and falsehood- -

gurmukhi: mwn srovru swDsMgu mwxk moqI rqn Amolw
transliteration: Maan Sarovaru Saadhasangu Maanak Motee Ratan Amolaa.
translation: Manasarovar (lake) in the form of holy congregation contains in it many invaluable rubies, pearls and jewels.

gurmukhi: gurmuiK vMsI prmhMs sbd suriq gurmiq Afolw
transliteration: Guramoukhi Vansee Param Hans Sabad Surati Guramati Adolaa.
translation: Gurmukhs too belong to the family of swans of highest order who merging their consciousness in the Word remain stabilized.

gurmukhi: KIrhu nIr inkwldy gurmuiK igAwnu iDAwnu inrolw
transliteration: Kheerahu Neer Nikaaladay Guramoukhi Giaanu Dhiaanu Nirolaa.
translation: Due to their power of knowledge and meditiation, the gurmukhs sift milk from water (i.e. truth from falsehood).

gurmukhi: gurmuiK scu slwhIAY qolu n qolnhwru Aqolw
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sachu Salaaheeai Tolu N Tolanahaaru Atolaa.
translation: Eulogising the truth, gurmukhs become incomparable and their glory cannot be measured by any one.

gurmukhi: mnmuK bgul smwiD hY Guit Guit jIAwN Kwie Abolw
transliteration: Manamoukh Bagul Samaadhi Hai Ghouti Ghouti Jeeaan Khaai Abolaa.
translation: Manmukh, the mind-oriented, is like a crane who silently strangulates the creatures and eats them up.

gurmukhi: hoie lKwau itkwie jwie CpiV aUhu pVY muhcolw
transliteration: Hoi Lakhaau Tikaai Jaai Chhaparhi Oohu Parhai Muhacholaa.
translation: Seeing it sitting at a pond, the creatures therein create an uproar and cries of distress.

gurmukhi: scu swaU kUVu gihlw golw ]4]
transliteration: Sachu Saau Koorhu Gahilaa Golaa ?4?
translation: Truth is noble whereas falsehood is lowly slave.

gurmukhi: 5 gurmuK-mnmuK sc-kUV
translation: Gurmukh, manmukh, truth and falsehood- -

gurmukhi: gurmuK scu sulKxw siB sulKx scu suhwvw
transliteration: Guramoukh Sachu Sulakhanaa Sabhi Sulakhan Sachu Suhaavaa.
translation: The true gurmukh possesses auspicious characteristics and all good marks adorn him.

gurmukhi: mnmuK kUVu kulKxw sB kulKx kUVu kudwvw
transliteration: Manamoukh Koorhu Kulakhanaa Sabh Kulakhan Koorhu Kudaavaa.
translation: Manmukh, the self-willed, keeps false marks and besides all bad characteristics in him, be possesses all deceptive tricks.

gurmukhi: scu suienw kUVu kcu hY kcu n kMcn muil mulwvw
transliteration: Sachu Suinaa Koorhu Kachu Hai Kachu N Kanchan Muli Mulaavaa.
translation: Truth is gold and falsehood is like glass. Glass cannot be priced as gold.

gurmukhi: scu Bwrw kUVu haulVw pvY n rqk rqnu Bulwvw
transliteration: Sachu Bhaaraa Koorhu Haularhaa Pavai N Ratak Ratanu Bhulaavaa.
translation: Truth is invariably heavy and the falsehood light; there is not the least doubt in this.

gurmukhi: scu hIrw kUVu Ptku hY jVY jVwv n juVY juVwvw
transliteration: Sachu Heeraa Koorhu Dhataku Hai Jarhai Jarhaav N Jurhai Jurhaavaa.
translation: The truth is diamond and the falsehood stone which cannot be studded in a string.

gurmukhi: scu dwqw kUVu mMgqw idhu rwqI cor swh imlwvw
transliteration: Sach Daataa Koorhu Mangataa Dihu Raatee Chor Saah Milaavaa.
translation: The truth is bestower whereas falsehood is a beggar; like a thief and a rich person or the day and the night they never meet.

gurmukhi: scu swbqu kUiV iPrdw Pwvw ]5]
transliteration: Sachu Saabatu Koorhi Dhiradaa Dhaavaa ?5?
translation: The truth is perfect and the falsehood a loser gambler running from pillar to post.

gurmukhi: 6 s`c Aqy kUV
translation: Truth and falsehood

gurmukhi: gurmuiK scu surMg hY mUl mjIT n tlY tlMdw
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sachu Surangu Hai Moolu Majeetd N Talai Taladaa.
translation: Truth in the form of gurmukhs is such a beautiful madder colour which never fades.

gurmukhi: mnmuK kUVu kurMg hY Pul kusuMBY iQr n rhMdw
transliteration: Manamoukhu Koorhu Kurang Hai Phul Kousounbhai Dir N Rahandaa.
translation: The colour of mind oriented, manmukh, is like the colour of safflower which soon fades away.

gurmukhi: Qom kQUrI vwsu lY nku mroVY min BwvMdw
transliteration: Dom Kadooree Vaasu Lai Naku Marorhai Mani Bhaavandaa.
translation: The falsehood, as against truth, is like garlic contrasted to musk. At the smell of the former the nose is turned away whereas the latter's fragrance is pleasing to mind.

gurmukhi: kUVu scu Ak AMb Pl kauVw imTw swau lhMdw
transliteration: Koorhu Sachu Ak Anb Phal Kaurhaa Mitdaa Saau Lahandaa.
translation: Falsehood and truth are like akk, the wild plant of sandy region and mango tree which bear bitter and sweet fruits respectively.

gurmukhi: swh cor sc kUVu hY swhu svY coru iPrY BvMdw
transliteration: Saah Chor Sachu Koorhu Hai Saahu Savai Choru Dhirai Bhavandaa.
translation: Truth and falsehood are like the bankar and the thief; the banker sleeps comfortably whereas the thief roams about hither and thither.

gurmukhi: swh PVY auiT cor no iqs nukswn dIbwx krMdw
transliteration: Saah Dharhai Outdi Chor No Tisu Noukasaan Deebaanu Karandaa.
translation: The banker catches hold of the thief and gets him further punished in the courts.

gurmukhi: scu kUVY lY inhix bhMdw ]6]
transliteration: Sachu Koorhai Lai Nihani Bahandaa ?6?
translation: The truth ultimately puts shackles around the falsehood.

gurmukhi: 7 sc Aqy kUV
translation: Truth and falsehood

gurmukhi: scu sohY isr pg ijau koJw kUVu kuQwie kCotw
transliteration: Sachu Sohai Sir Pag Jiu Kojhaa Koorhu Kudaai Kachhotaa.
translation: The truth adorns the head like a turban but the falsehood is like a loincloth which remains in an untidy place.

gurmukhi: scu sqwxw swrdUlu kUVu ijvY hIxw hrxotw
transliteration: Sachu Sataanaa Saaradoolu Koorhu Jivai Heenaa Haranotaa.
translation: The truth is a potent lion and the falsehood is like an abased deer.

gurmukhi: lwhw scu vxMjIAY kUVu ik vxjhu AwvY qotw
transliteration: Laahaa Sachu Vananjeeai Koorhu Ki Vanajahu Aavai Totaa.
translation: Transactions of truth bring gains whereas the trading in falsehood brings nothing but loss.

gurmukhi: scu Krw swbwis hY kUVu n clY dmVw Kotw
transliteration: Sachu Kharaa Saabaasi Hai Koorhu N Chalai Damarhaa Khotaa.
translation: Truth being pure earns applause but the falsehood like a counter coin does not get circulated.

gurmukhi: qwry lK AmwvsY Gyir Anyir cnwiexu hotw
transliteration: Taaray Lakh Amaavasai Ghayri Anayri Chanaainu Hotaa.
translation: In the no-moon night, millions of stars remain there (in the sky) but the scarcity of light persists and pitch darkness prevails.

gurmukhi: sUrj iek cVHMidAw hoie AT KMf pvY PlPotw
transliteration: Sooraj Iku Charhanhadiaa Hoi Atd Khand Pavai Phaladhotaa.
translation: With the rise of the sun the darkness dispells in all the eight directions.

gurmukhi: kUVu scu ijauN vtu GVotw ]7]
transliteration: Koorhu Sachu Jioun Vatu Gharhotaa ?7?
translation: The relationship between the false hood and the truth is similar to the relation of the pitcher and the stone.

gurmukhi: 8 s`c Aqy kUV
translation: Truth and falsehood

gurmukhi: suhxy swmrqK ijau kUVu scu vrqY vrqwrw
transliteration: Suhanay Saamaratakh Jiu Koorhu Sachu Varatai Varataaraa.
translation: Falsehood to truth is the same as dream to reality.

gurmukhi: hir cMdaurI ngr vwNgu kUVu scu prgtu pwhwrw
transliteration: Hari Chandauree Nagar Vaangu Koorhu Sachu Paragatu Paahaaraa.
translation: The falsehood is like imaginary city in the sky whereas the truth is like manifest world.

gurmukhi: ndI pCwvwN mwxsw isr qlvwieAw AMbru qwrw
transliteration: Nadee Pachhaavaan Maanasaa Sir Talavaaiaa Anbaru Taaraa.
translation: Falsehood is like the shadow of men in the river, where the image of trees, stars is inverted.

gurmukhi: DUAru DuMDUkwru hoie quil n Gxhir vrsxhwrw
transliteration: Dhooaru Dhoundhookaaru Hoi Tuli N Ghanahari Varasanahaaraa.
translation: Smoke also creates mist but this darkness is not similar to the darkness caused by rain clouds.

gurmukhi: swau n ismrix sMkrY dIpk bwJu n imtY AMDwrw
transliteration: Saau N Simarani Sankarai Deepak Baajhu N Mitai Andhaaraa.
translation: As remembrance of sugar does not bring forth the sweet taste, the darkness cannot be dispelled without lamp.

gurmukhi: lVy n kwgil iliKAw icqu icqyry sY hQIAwrw
transliteration: Larhay N Kaagali Likhiaa Chitu Chitayray Sai Hadeeaaraa.
translation: The warrior can never fight adopting the weapons printed on paper.

gurmukhi: scu kUVu krqUiq vIcwrw ]8]
transliteration: Sachu Koorhu Karatooti Veechaaraa ?8?
translation: Such are the actions of the truth and the falsehood.

gurmukhi: 9 s`c Aqy kUV
translation: Truth and falsehood

gurmukhi: scu smwiexu duD ivic kUV ivgwVu kwNjI dI cuKY
transliteration: Sachu Samaainu Dudh Vichi Koorh Vigaarhu Kaanjee Dee Choukhai.
translation: The truth is the rennet in the milk whereas falsehood is like the spoiling vinegar.

gurmukhi: scu Bojnu muih Kwvxw ieku dwxw nkY vil duKY
transliteration: Sachu Bhojanu Muhi Khaavanaa Iku Daanaa Nakai Vali Doukhai.
translation: The truth is like eating the food through mouth but the falsehood s painful as if a grain has gone into the nose.

gurmukhi: Plhu ruK ruKhu su Plu AMiqkwil Kau lwKhu ruKY
transliteration: Phalahu Roukh Roukhahu Su Phalu Anti Kaali Khau Laakhahu Roukhai.
translation: From fruit emerges tree and nom tree the fruit; but if shellac attacks the tree, the latter is destroyed (similarly falsehood decimates the individual).

gurmukhi: sau virAw Aig ruK ivic Bsm krY Aig ibMdku DuKY
transliteration: Sau Variaa Agi Roukh Vichi Bhasam Karai Agi Bindaku Dhoukhai.
translation: For hundreds of years, the fire remains latent in the tree, but enraged by a small spark, it destroys the ree (similarly the falsehood ever remaining in the mind, ultimately destroys the man).

gurmukhi: scu dwrU kUVu rogu hY ivxu gur vYd vydin mnmuKY
transliteration: Sachu Daaroo Koorhu Rogu Hai Vinu Gur Vaid Vaydani Manamoukhai.
translation: The truth is medicine whereas the falsehood is a disease which inflicts the manmukhs who are without physician in the form of Guru.

gurmukhi: scu sQoeI kUV Tgu lgY duKu n gurmuiK suKY
transliteration: Sachu Sadoee Koorh Tdagu Lagai Doukhu N Guramoukhi Soukhai.
translation: Truth is companion and the falsehood a cheat who cannot make the gurmukh suffer (because they ever abide in the pleasure of truth).

gurmukhi: kUVu pcY scY dI BuKY ]9]
transliteration: Koorhu Pachai Sachai Dee Bhoukhai ?9?
translation: Falsehood perishes and the truth is ever desired.

gurmukhi: 10 s`c Aqy kUV
translation: Truth and falsehood

gurmukhi: kUVu kpt hiQAwr ijau scu rKvwlw islh sMjoAw
transliteration: Koorhu Kapat Hadiaar Jiu Sachu Rakhavaalaa Silah Sanjoaa.
translation: Falsehood is a fake weapon whereas the truth is protector like an iron-armour.

gurmukhi: kUVu vYrI inq johdw scu suimqu ihmwieiq hoAw
transliteration: Koorhu Vairee Nit Johadaa Sachu Soumitu Himaaiti Hoaa.
translation: Like enemy, falsehood always lies in ambush but the truth, like a friend is ever ready to help and support.

gurmukhi: sUrvIru vrIAwmu scu kUVu kuVwvw krdw FoAw
transliteration: Sooraveeru Vareeaamu Sachu Koorhu Kurhaavaa Karadaa Ddhoaa.
translation: The truth is truly a brave warrior who meets the truthful ones whereas the Her meets Hers alone.

gurmukhi: inhclu scu suQwie hY lrjY kUVu kuQwie KVoAw
transliteration: Nihachalu Sachu Sudaai Hai Larajai Koorhu Kudaai Kharhoaa.
translation: At good places, the truth stands firmly but being in the wrong places, falsehood always shakes and trembles.

gurmukhi: sic PiV kUVu pCwiVAw cwir ck vyKn qRY loAw
transliteration: Sachi Dharhi Koorhu Pachhaarhiaa Chaari Chak Vaykhan Trai Loaa.
translation: The four directions and the three worlds are witness (to the fact) that the truth catching hold of falsehood has thrashed it.

gurmukhi: kUVu kptu rogI sdw scu sdw hI nvwN inroAw
transliteration: Koorhu Kapatu Rogee Sadaa Sachu Sadaa Hee Navaan Niroaa.
translation: Deceptive falsehood is ever diseased and the truth is always hale and hearty.

gurmukhi: scu scw kUVu kUVu ivKoAw ]10]
transliteration: Sachu Sachaa Koorhu Koorhu Vikhoaa ?10?
translation: The adopter of truth is ever known as truthful and the follower of falsehood is ever considered a Tier.

gurmukhi: 11 s`c kUV dw inrxRX
translation: Judgement about the truth and falsehood

gurmukhi: scu sUrju prgwsu hY kUVhu GuGU kuJu n suJY
transliteration: Sachu Sooraju Paragaasu Hai Koorhahu Ghoughoo Kujhu N Sujhai.
translation: The truth is sun-light and falsehood is owl which cannot see anything.

gurmukhi: sc vxspiq bohIAY kUVhu vws n cMdn buJY
transliteration: Sach Vanasapati Boheeai Koorhahu Vaas N Chandan Bujhai.
translation: The fragrance of truth diffuses in the whole vegetation but falsehood in the form of bamboo does not identify sandal.

gurmukhi: schu sPl qrovrw isMmlu APlu vfweI luJY
transliteration: Sachahu Saphal Tarovaraa Sinmalu Aphalu Vadaaee Lujhai.
translation: Truth makes a fruitful tree where as the proud silk cotton tree being fruitless is ever anguished.

gurmukhi: swvix vx hrIAwvly sukY Aku jvwhwN ruJY
transliteration: Saavani Van Hareeaavalay Soukai Aku Javaahaan Rujhai.
translation: In the month of silvan all the forests go green but akk, the wild plant of sandy region, and javds, the camel-thorn, remain dry.

gurmukhi: mwxk moqI mwnsir sMK insKx hsqn duJY
transliteration: Maanak Motee Maanasari Sankhi Nisakhan Hasatan Dujhai.
translation: Rubies and pearls are there in the Manasarovar but the conch being empty within is pressed by hands.

gurmukhi: scu gMgodku inrmlw kUiV rlY md prgtu guJY
transliteration: Sachu Gangodaku Niramalaa Koorhi Ralai Mad Paragatu Gujhai.
translation: Truth is pure like the water of the Ganges but the wine of falsehood, even if hidden, makes its foul smell manifest.

gurmukhi: scu scw kUVu kUVhu KuJY ]11]
transliteration: Sachu Sachaa Koorhu Koorhahu Khujhai ?11?
translation: Truth is truthful and falsehood remains false.

gurmukhi: 12 s`c kUV dw AMq
translation: End of the truth and falsehood

gurmukhi: scu kUV duie JwgVU JgVw krdy cauqY AwieAw
transliteration: Sachu Koorh Dui Jhaagarhoo Jhagarhaa Karadaa Chaoutai Aaiaa.
translation: Truth and falsehood had a tiff and quarrelling they came to the dias of justice.

gurmukhi: Agy scw sic inAwie Awp hjUir dovY JgVwieAw
transliteration: Agay Sachaa Sachi Niaai Aap Hajoori Dovai Jhagarhaaiaa.
translation: Dispenser of the true justice made them to debate their points there.

gurmukhi: scu scw kUiV kUiVAwru pMcw ivicdo kir smJwieAw
transliteration: Sachu Sachaa Koorhi Koorhiaaru Panchaa Vichido Kari Samajhaaiaa.
translation: The wise mediators concluded that the truth is true and the falsehood Her.

gurmukhi: sic ijqw kUiV hwirAw kUVu kUVw kir shir iPrwieAw
transliteration: Sachi Jitaa Koorhi Haariaa Koorhu Koorhaa Kari Sahari Dhiraaiaa.
translation: The truth triumphed and the falsehood lost and being labeled untrue, was paraded in the whole city.

gurmukhi: sicAwrY swbwis hY kUiVAwrY iPtu iPtu krwieAw
transliteration: Sachiaarai Saabaasi Hai Koorhiaarai Dhitu Dhitu Karaaiaa.
translation: The truthfull was applauded but the untrue incurred opprobrium.

gurmukhi: sc lhxw kUiV dyvxw Kqu sqwglu iliK dyvwieAw
transliteration: Sach Lahanaa Koorhi Dayvanaa Khatu Sataagalu Likhi Dayvaaiaa.
translation: This was written on a piece of paper that the truth is creditory and the falsehood debtor.

gurmukhi: Awp Tgwie n TgIAY TgxhwrY Awpu TgwieAw
transliteration: Aap Tdagaai N Tdageeai Tdaganahaarai Aapu Tdagaaiaa.
translation: He who allows himself to be cheated is never deceived and he who cheats others gets himself cheated.

gurmukhi: ivrlw scu ivhwJx AwieAw ]12]
transliteration: Viralaa Sachu Vihaajhan Aaiaa ?12?
translation: Any rare one is a buyer of truth.

gurmukhi: 13 s`c kUV dw AMq
translation: End of the truth and falsehood

gurmukhi: kUVu suqw scu jwgdw scu swihb dy min BwieAw
transliteration: Koorhu Soutaa Sachu Jaagadaa Sachu Saahib Day Mani Bhaaiaa.
translation: Since the falsehood sleeps while the truth remains awake, the truth is loved by that Lord God.

gurmukhi: scu scY kir pwhrU sc BMfwr auqy bihlwieAw
transliteration: Sachu Sachai Kari Paaharoo Sach Bhandaar Outay Bahilaaiaa.
translation: The true Lord has appointed truth as the watchman and has made it to sit at the store of truth.

gurmukhi: scu AwgU AwnHyr kUV auJiV dUjw Bwau clwieAw
transliteration: Sachu Aagoo Aanhayr Koorh Ujharhi Doojaa Bhaau Chalaaiaa.
translation: The truth is the guide and the falsehood is the darkness which causes people to wander in the jungle of duality.

gurmukhi: scu scy kir Paujdwru rwhu clwvx jogu pTwieAw
transliteration: Sachu Sachay Kari Dhaujadaaru Raahu Chalaavanu Jogu Patdaaiaa.
translation: Appointing truth as the commander, the true Lord has made it competent to take people along path of righteousness.

gurmukhi: jg Bvjl imil swDsMig gur boihQY cwViH qrwieAw
transliteration: Jag Bhavajalu Mili Saadhasangi Gur Bohidai Chaarhhi Taraaiaa.
translation: To get people across the world ocean, the truth as Guru, has taken the people across in the vessel as the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: kwmu kRoDu loBu mohu PiV AhMkwru grdin mrvwieAw
transliteration: Kaam Krodh Lobhu Mohu Dharhi Ahankaaru Garadani Maravaaiaa.
translation: Lust, anger, greed, infatuation and ego have been killed by holding them from their necks.

gurmukhi: pwir pey guru pUrw pwieAw ]13]
transliteration: Paari Paay Guru Pooraa Paaiaa ?13?
translation: Those who have got the perfect Guru, have gone across (the world ocean).

gurmukhi: 14 s`c, s`cw is`K, s`cw gurU
translation: Truth, the true Sikh, the true Guru,  ,

gurmukhi: lUxu swihb dw KwiekY rx AMdir liV mrY su jwpY
transliteration: Loonu Saahib Daa Khaai Kai Ran Andari Larhi Marai Su Jaapai.
translation: True is he who is true to the salt of his master and dies fighting for him in the battelfield.

gurmukhi: isr vFY hQIAwru kir vrIAwmw vrIAwmu is\\\\wpY
transliteration: Sir Vaddhai Hadeeaaru Kari Vareeaamaa Variaamu Siaapai.
translation: One who beheads the enemy with his weapon is known as brave among the warriors.

gurmukhi: iqsu ipCY jo iesqrI Qip QyeI dy vrY srwpY
transliteration: Tisu Pichhai Jo Isataree Dapi Dayee Day Varai Saraapai.
translation: His bereaved woman is established as sati capable of granting boons and curses.

gurmukhi: poqY puq vfIrIAin prvwrY swDwru prwpY
transliteration: Potai Pout Vadeereeani Paravaarai Saadhaaru Paraapai.
translation: Sons and grandsons are praised and the whole family becomes exalted.

gurmukhi: vKqY aupir liV mrY AMmiRq vylY sbdu AlwpY
transliteration: Vakhatai Oupari Larhi Marai Anmrit Vaylai Sabadu Alaapai.
translation: One who dies fighting in the hour of peril and recites the Word in the ambrosial hour is known as the true warrior.

gurmukhi: swDsMgiq ivic jwiekY haumY mwir mrY Awpu AwpY
transliteration: Saadhasangati Vichi Jaai Kai Haoumai Maari Marai Aapu Aapai.
translation: Going to the holy congregation and effacing his desires, he wipes out his ego.

gurmukhi: liV mrxw qY sqI hoxu gurmuiK pMQu pUrx prqwpY
transliteration: Larhi Maranaa Tai Satee Honu Guramoukhi Pandu Pooran Parataapai.
translation: Dying while fighting in battle and maintaining of the controle over the senses is the grand path of the gurmukhs.

gurmukhi: sic isdk sc pIru pCwpY ]14]
transliteration: Sachi Sidak Sach Peeru Pachhaapai ?14?
translation: In whom you repose your full faith is known as the true Guru.

gurmukhi: 15 swD sMgq
translation: The holy congregation

gurmukhi: inhcl scw Qyhu hY swDsMgu pMjy prDwnw
transliteration: Nihachalu Sachaa Dayhu Hai Saadhasangu Panjay Paradhaanaa.
translation: The city in the form of holy congregation is true and immovable because in it reside all the five chiefs (virtues).

gurmukhi: siq sMqoKu dieAw Drmu ArQu smrQu sBo bMDwnw
transliteration: Sati Santokhu Daiaa Dharamu Aradu Samaradu Sabho Bandhaanaa.
translation: Truth, contentment, compassion, dharma and lucre are capable of all control.

gurmukhi: gur aupdysu kmwvxw gurmuiK nwmu dwnu iesnwnw
transliteration: Gur Oupadaysu Kamaavanaa Guramoukhi Naamu Daanu Isanaanaa.
translation: Here, the gurmukhs practise the teachings of the Guru and observe meditation on ram, charity and ablution.

gurmukhi: imTw bolxu iniv clxu hQhu dyx Bgiq gurigAwnw
transliteration: Mitdaa Bolanu Nivi Chalanu Hadahu Dayn Bhagati Gur Giaanaa.
translation: People speak sweet here, walk humbly, give away charities and attain knowledge through devotion to the Guru.

gurmukhi: duhI srweI surKurU sc sbdu vjY nIswnw
transliteration: Duhee Saraaee Surakharoo Sachu Sabadu Vajai Neesaanaa.
translation: They remain free from any anxiety in this world and the world hereafter, and for them, the drums of true

gurmukhi: clxu ijMnHI jwixAwN jg AMdir ivrly imhmwnw
transliteration: Chalanu Jinnhee Jaaniaa Jag Andari Viralay Mihamaanaa.
translation: Word are struck upon. Rare are the guests who have accepted the going away from this world, as true.

gurmukhi: Awp gvwey iqsu kurbwnw ]15]
transliteration: Aap Gavaaay Tisu Kurabaanaa ?15?
translation: I am sacrifice unto them who have eschewed their ego.

gurmukhi: 16 JUTw ipMf
translation: The false village

gurmukhi: kUV AhIrwN ipMfu hY pMj dUq vsin buirAwrw
transliteration: Koorh Aheeraan Pindu Hai Panj Doot Vasani Buriaaraa.
translation: Falsehood is-the village of robbers where reside the five evil legates.

gurmukhi: kwm kroDu ivroDu inq loB mohu DRohu AhMkwrw
transliteration: Kaam Karodhu Virodhu Nit Lobh Moh Dhroh Ahankaaraa.
translation: These couriers are lust, anger, disputation, greed, infatuation, treachery and ego.

gurmukhi: iKMjoqwxu AswDu sMgu vrqY pwpY dw vrqwrw
transliteration: Khinjotaanu Asaadhu Sangu Varatai Paapai Daa Varataaraa.
translation: In this village of wicked company pulls, pushes and sinful conduct always operate.

gurmukhi: pr Dn pr inMdw ipAwru pr nwrI isau vfy ivkwrw
transliteration: Par Dhan Par Nidaa Piaaru Par Naaree Siu Vaday Vikaaraa.
translation: Attachment to the others' wealth, slander and woman always persist here

gurmukhi: Kluhlu mUil n cukeI rwj fMfu jm fMfu krwrw
transliteration: Khaluhalu Mooli N Choukaee Raaj Dandu Jam Dandu Karaaraa.
translation: Confusions and commotions are ever there and people always undergo punishments of state as well as of death.

gurmukhi: duhI srweI jrdrU jMmx mrx nrik Avqwrw
transliteration: Duhee Saraaee Jaradaroo Janman Maran Naraki Avataaraa.
translation: The residents of this village are always shameful in both the worlds and go on transmigrating in the hell.

gurmukhi: AgI Pl hovin AMigAwrw ]16]
transliteration: Agee Phal Hovani Angiaaraa ?16?
translation: The fruits of fire are the sparks only.

gurmukhi: 17 s`c ivc kUV dI smweI nhIN
translation: Falsehood cannot merge in truth

gurmukhi: scu spUrx inrmlw iqsu ivic kUVu n rldw rweI
transliteration: Sachu Sapooran Niramalaa Tisu Vichi Koorhu N Raladaa Raaee.
translation: The truth being perfectly pure, falsehood cannot mix in it as a piece of straw gone into the eye cannot be held there

gurmukhi: AKI kqu n sMjrY iqxu AauKw duiK rYix ivhweI
transliteration: Akhee Katu N Sanjarai Tinu Aoukhaa Doukhi Raini Vihaaee.
translation: And the whole night is spent in suffering.

gurmukhi: Bojx AMdir miK ijau hoie dukuDw Pyir kFweI
transliteration: Bhojan Andari Makhi Jiu Hoi Doukudhaa Dhayri Kaddhaaee.
translation: Fly in the meal also is vomited out (by body).

gurmukhi: rUeI AMdir icxg vwNg dwih BsmMqu kry duKdweI
transliteration: Rooee Andari Chinag Vaang Daahi Bhasamantu Karay Doukhadaaee.
translation: One spark in a load of cotton creates trouble for it, and burning the whole lot converts it into ashes.

gurmukhi: kwNjI duDu kusuDu hoie iPtY swdhu vMnhu jweI
transliteration: Kaanjee Dudhu Kousudh Hoi Dhitai Saadahu Vannahu Jaaee.
translation: Vineger in milk spoils its taste and makes it discoloured.

gurmukhi: mhurw cuKku ciKAw pwiqswhw mwrY shsweI
transliteration: Mahuraa Choukhaku Chakhiaa Paatisaahaa Maarai Sahamaaee.
translation: Even a little bit of poison tasted kills emperors instantly.

gurmukhi: sic AMdir ikau kUVu kmweIsmweI ]17]
transliteration: Sachi Andari Kiu Koorhu Samaaee ?17?
translation: Then how can truth mix up in falsehood?

gurmukhi: 18 s`c nUM kUV Awvr nhIN skdw
translation: Falsehood cannot efface truth

gurmukhi: gurmuiK scu Ailpqu hY kUVhu lypu n lgY BweI
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sachu Alipatu Hai Koorhahu Laypu N Lagai Bhaaee.
translation: Truth in the form of gurmukh ever remains detached and the falsehood has no impact on it.

gurmukhi: cMdn spIN vyiVAw cVHY n ivsu n vwsu GtweI
transliteration: Chandan Sapeen Vayrhiaa Charhhai N Visu N Vaasu Ghataaee.
translation: Sandal wood tree is surrounded by snakes but neither the poison affects it nor its fragrance is lessened.

gurmukhi: pwrsu AMdir pQrwN AstDwqu imil ivgiV n jweI
transliteration: Paarasu Andari Padaraan Asat Dhaatu Mili Vigarhi N Jaaee.
translation: Amid the stones resides the philosopher's stone but even meeting the eight metals it does not get spoiled.

gurmukhi: gMg sMig ApivqR jlu kir n skY ApivqR imlweI
transliteration: Gang Sangi Apavitr Jalu Kari N Sakai Apavitr Milaaee.
translation: Polluted water mixing into the Ganges cannot pollute it.

gurmukhi: swier Aig n lgeI myru sumyru n vwau fulweI
transliteration: Saair Agi N Lagaee Mayru Soumayru N Vaau Dulaaee.
translation: Seas are never burnt by fire and air cannot shake mountains.

gurmukhi: bwxu n Duir Asmwix jwie vwhyNdVu ipCY pCuqweI
transliteration: Baanu N Dhuri Asamaani Jaai Vaahayndarhu Pichhai Pachhoutaaee.
translation: The arrow can never touch the sky and the shooter repents afterwards.

gurmukhi: EVik kUVu kUVo huie jweI ]18]
transliteration: Aorhaki Koorhu Koorho Hui Jaaee ?18?
translation: The falshood ultimately is false.

gurmukhi: 19 kUV AMq pRgt ho jwNdw hY
translation: The falsehood comes out ultimately

gurmukhi: scu scwvw mwxu hY kUV kUVwvI mxI mnUrI
transliteration: Sachu Sachaavaa Maanu Hai Koorh Koorhaavee Manee Manooree.
translation: The regards for truth are always genuine and falsehood is always identified as fake.

gurmukhi: kUVY kUVI pwie hY scu scwvI gurmiq pUrI
transliteration: Koorhay Koorh Paai Hai Sachu Sachaavee Guramati Pooree.
translation: Respect of the falsehood is also artificial but the wisdom of Guru given to truth is perfect one.

gurmukhi: kUVY kUVw joir hY sic sqwxI grb grUrI
transliteration: Koorhai Koorhee Jori Hai Sachi Sataanee Garab Garooree.
translation: The power of a Tier is also counterfeit and even the pious ego of truth is deep and full of gravity.

gurmukhi: kUV n drgh mMnIAY scu suhwvw sdw hjUrI
transliteration: Koorhu N Daragah Manneeai Sachu Suhaavaa Sadaa Hajooree.
translation: Falsehood is not recognised in the court of the Lord whereas truth always adorns His court.

gurmukhi: sukrwnw hY scu Gir kUVu kuPr Gir nw swbUrI
transliteration: Soukaraanaa Hai Sachu Ghari Koorhu Kudhar Ghari Naa Saabooree.
translation: In the home of truth, there is always a sense of gratefulness but falsehood never feels contented.

gurmukhi: hsiq cwl hY sc dI kUiV kuFMgI cwl ByfUrI
transliteration: Hasati Chaal Hai Sach Dee Koorhi Kuddhangee Chaal Bhaydooree.
translation: The gait of truth is like that of elephant whereas falsehood moves clumsily like sheep.

gurmukhi: mUlI pwn ifkwr ijau muil n quil lsxu ksqUrI
transliteration: Moolee Paan Dikaar Jiu Mooli N Tuli Lasanu Kasatooree.
translation: The value of musk and garlic cannot be kept at par and same is the case of the eructation of radish and betel.

gurmukhi: bIjY ivsu n KwvY cUrI ]19]
transliteration: Beejai Visu N Khaavai Chooree ?19?
translation: He who sows poison cannot eat delicious meal made with crushed bread mixed with butter and sugar (chart).

gurmukhi: 20 kUV dw AMq burw huMdw hY
translation: The end of the falsehood is very bad

gurmukhi: scu suBwau mjIT dw shY Avtx rMgu cVHwey
transliteration: Sachu Soubhaau Majeetd Daa Sahai Avatan Rangu Charhhaaay.
translation: The nature of truth is like madder which itself bears the heat of boiling but makes the dye fast.

gurmukhi: sx ijau kUVu suBwau hY Kl kFwie vtwie bnwey
transliteration: San Jiu Koorhu Soubhaau Hai Khal Kaddhaai Vataai Banaaay.
translation: The nature of falsehood is like that of jute whose skin is peeled off and then twisting it, its ropes are prepared.

gurmukhi: cMnx praupkwr kir APl sPl ivic vwsu vswey
transliteration: Channan Paraoupakaaru Kari Aphal Saphal Vichi Vaasu Vasaaay.
translation: Sandal being benevolent makes all the trees, be they with or without fruits, fragrant.

gurmukhi: vfw ivkwrI vwNsu hY haumY jlY gvwNFu jlwey
transliteration: Vadaa Vikaaree Vaansu Hai Haoumai Jalai Gavaanddhu Jalaaay.
translation: Bamboo being full of evil, bums in its own ego and at the out break of fire, bums its other neighbourly trees also.

gurmukhi: jwx AimE rsu kwlkUtu KwDY mrY muey jIvwey
transliteration: Jaan Amiao Rasu Kaalakootu Khaadhai Marai Muay Jeevaaay.
translation: The nectar makes the dead alive and deadly poison kills the living.

gurmukhi: drgh scu kbUlu hY kUVhu drgh imlY sjwey
transliteration: Daragah Sachu Kaboolu Hai Koorhahu Daragah Milai Sajaaay.
translation: Truth is accepted in the court of the Lord, but, the falshood is punished in the same court.

gurmukhi: jo bIjY soeI Plu Kwey ]20]30]
transliteration: Jo Beejai Soee Phalu Khaaay ?20?30?teeha?
translation: One reaps what one sows.

gurmukhi: giH mih giHsqI huie pwieE n shj Gir bin bnvws n audws fl pwieE hY
transliteration: Grih Mahi Grihasatee Hui Paaiao N Sahaj Ghari , Bani Banavaas N Udaas Dal Paaiao Hai ?
translation: Without Guru's teaching and all by himself a householder engrossed in all household duties cannot reach the state of oneness with Lord nor renouncing the world and living in jungles can he attain Him

gurmukhi: piV piV pMifq n AkQ kQw ibcwrI isDwsn kY n inj Awsn idVwieE hY
transliteration: Parhi Parhi Pandit N Akad Kadaa Bichaaree , Sidhaasan Kai N Nij Aasan Dirhaaiao Hai ?
translation: By becoming a scholar, reading scriptures no one can become knowledgeable of the magnificence of the Lord and describe Him. Nor by doing Yogic practices can one merge in Him.

gurmukhi: jog iDAwn Dwrn kY nwQn dyKy n nwQ jig Bog pUjw kY n Aghu ghwieE hY
transliteration: Jog Dhiaan Dhaaran Kai Naadan Daykhay N Naada , Jagi Bhog Poojaa Kai N Agahu Gahaaiao Hai ?
translation: Yogis, Naths could not realise Him by their strenuous yogic practices, nor can He be attained by doing yags etc.

gurmukhi: dyvI dyv syv kY n AhMmyv tyv twrI AlK AByv gurdyv smJwieE hY ]30]
transliteration: Dayvee Dayv Sayv Kai N Ahanmayv Tayv Taaree , Alakh Abhayv Gurdayv Samajhaaiao Hai ?30?
translation: Serving gods and goddesses one cannot get rid of one's ego. All this worship and offerings before these gods and goddesses only inflate the ego. The Lord who is beyond reach and description can only be reached with the teachings, knowledge and wisdom of t
